thread.title: Charles Wischmeyer
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Charles Wischmeyer

author: Charles Wischmeyer
title: Charles Wischmeyer
text: Friendly sales people & a good selection at the right price are the reasons we chose Gardiner White. After weeks of looking for a sofa and love seat we found a beautiful set that no one else had. The pricing was extremely reasonable and a little extra discounts cinched the deal for us. My husband and I are a little older and can't move furniture so we were very impressed when our salesman offered free delivery! We will be back again!
